mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${tableName} (ID_, MD_CODE, MD_NAME, M_ID, USER_CODE, ORG_CODE, CREATE_TIME) VALUES (#{id},#{code},#{name},#{mid},#{userCode},#{orgCode},#{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID_ AS id, A.MD_NAME AS name, A.MD_CODE AS code FROM ${tableName} A WHERE A.MD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%' AND ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT A.ID_ AS mid, A.MD_NAME AS stdName, A.MD_CODE AS stdCode FROM ${stdTableName} A WHERE A.MD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{stdName} || '%' AND ROWNUM <=10
